channel.title: Drop Shadow Signature ~
channel.description: Just needed to make a signature to get the hang of how to add a Drop Shadow, this was the outcome of it all. Constructive Criticism would be appreciated of course. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/10fvzi9.png[/img]

item.title: Drop Shadow Signature ~
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Looks weird with a white banner, unless perhaps you’re using it on a darker forum. On a lighter background, it looks pretty odd, and the shadow seems a little dark. Also, lord, I cannot stress enough about the depth - at least just put a smaller drop shadow on it. You also need a focal point. Pretty much the same as last time, except one thing I must say for sure: You have improved on your text. I see progress, it looks nice! Just, perhaps the render is a bit long, maybe? Though, like I said, it probably would suit a darker website more. Though, the image itself has improved. Good job.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Shadow Signature ~
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I mean just make it a little bit closer to the main object.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop Shadow Signature ~
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

Ambokile:

Try lowering the shadow distance a little, I think it’d look better.

thank you for your feedback, but I don’t want to lower it so much that it looks diagonally standing.

Read full topic
